modName: ATI Shadow Hotfix by prOPA inspired by Guru82
summary: Since AMD Catalyst Software Suite 12.5 created a broken shadow for some users.
descriptionHtml:
Will fix this shadow problem

[youtube]2GHzzqCFmVc[/youtube]


ATI Shadow Hotfix by prOPA and inspire by Guru82

Since AMD Catalyst Software Suite 12.5 created a broken shadow for some users.
Here is a workaround until the problem is addressed officially.

For Windows 7 32bit and 64bit the dll was taken from 12.4 driver.
The dll is the same in both 32bit and 64bit.

Install:
1. Drop all the files into your Skyrim folder.
Common Skyrim directory:
32-bit; "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\"
64-bit; "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\"
2. Run ATI_Install_DLL to expand the Dll file
3. Turn on Skyrim and test.
4. Enjoy if it worked for you. Comment if it doesn't.
Note: You can easily uninstall this Hotfix by running ATI_Shadow_Hotfix_Uninstall

[color=yellow][size=6][u][center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23202/]prOPAs ENB 117 and 119 darker Nights for CoT [/url][/center][/u][/size][/color]

Credits:
Guru82
carbonic at http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2554717&p=29311870
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13071
